You must hire teams of adventurers and send them into the dangerous trap-filled catacombs to bring back your fortune. The game is played over three rounds, with each round following these phases:


Providing Phase: Players reset the round and receive new funds.
Investigation "Inquiry" Phase: Players bid on which catacomb floor they wish to take a peek at; if they are the highest bidder, they can look at what lurks in that area.
Recruiting "Organization" Phase: Players secretly bid on which characters they wish to recruit to become part of their party.
Exploration Phase: Players secretly choose how far they wish to delve into the dungeon, then resolve the effects of the monsters/traps they encounter which will give them VPs if they survive.


Whoever is able to gain enough VPs from surviving their encounters is victorious!

158605.description:
The three Rock Gold cards allow the players to win extra Gold points.

At the start of each round, after distributing the Miner cards, the player to the right of the Start player chooses and places one Rock gold card face up on any empty spot between the Start card and the Destination cards (but not adjacent to one of these cards). The card remains on that spot till the end of the round.
The first player who manages to establish an uninterrupted path from the Start card to the Rock Gold card, gets the Gold points which are displayed on the card. He/she takes the corresponding Gold point card (Saboteur) or token (Saboteur 2) and places it visible in front of him/her.

A player can secure the Rock gold points in the following 2 ways:
1. Announce during their turn they quit the current round: they play no more cards (but keep their role hidden) and only gain the Rock gold points
2. Continue playing and winning the round till the end : gain the Rock gold points + their share of the Gold for the winning team

In case the player continues playing and his/her team loses, he/she gets no gold at all and must discard the gold points which were acquired by connecting the Rock card. The card or token is put back in the reserve.
158605.name: Saboteur: Rock Gold

158606.name: Moonshot Euchre
158606.description:
Moonshot Euchre is a trick-taking card game that can be played with two, three or four players.

It is a twist on the game of Euchre. It uses a double deck, which means there's two of of every card. When one suit becomes trump, there are TWO Right Bowers and TWO Left Bowers. It also adds a no trump bid, and the use of Jack-Ace from two decks, making it more difficult. One round of bidding leaves players wishing they had bid higher the first chance they had. Additionally, you can aim for the sky and take all tricks by bidding a Moonshot.

158607.name: Mythic Martial Arts I
158607.description:
From publisher blurb:

The 20th in our new series of Mythic Minis, Mythic Martial Arts I brings you 8 new feats for your mythic heroes that punch, kick, throw, and grapple their enemies into submission with the power of their ki, from Binding Throw to Crushing Blow, Elusive Redirection to Stunning Pin, and more!

158608.name: Rangers
158608.description:
From publisher blurb:

Characters in rpgs often have abilities are not tied to their class, race or skill, although they may be related/useful to it. These are called Feats.

They may be combat related, a way to tweak spells or even to do with the crafting of an item. Some will be useful to almost everyone, others only in very certain circumstances.

This edition of “Fantastic Feats” – a series of feats based around a certain theme or subject – is about Paladins, those noble warriors who oppose evil with their body and soul.

Feats you find inside:

Companion Bond - Have a better bond with your party
Empathic Expert - Become better at being empathic with animals
Expert Tracker - Your favoured terrain is your second home
Favoured Damage Maximise - You know just how to hurt your favoured enemy more
Favoured Intimidation - Your favoured enemies are more intimidated by you
Risky Combat - Your favoured enemies damage can decrease, but sometimes increase
Terrain Master - Become one with your favoured terrain

158609.name: Ingenium Second Edition Quick Start Preview
158609.description:
From publisher blurb:

This 92 page PDF gives you a good look at the character creation, equipment creation, and spell creation process that utilizes our Three Word System! On top of that, it gives you a short adventure that gets you a look at how the system works, and gets your characters through first level and establishes them with a reputation amongst their home town.

Keep in mind, that this layout is just a quick layout for the book, just to give you a taste. The final layout of Ingenium Second Edition will look much better! We just wanted to give you a taste of what awaits in the Second Edition!

158610.name: Social Media: The Collective
158610.description:
From publisher blurb:

Welcome to the eighth issue of Going Postal, a series of supplements for the Mutant Future role-playing game by Goblinoid Games.

This is the first issue that delves into a post-apocalyptic societial structure, the Collective. Built upon the idea of the hive mind, collectives share a communal mind where all members are intrinsically connected to each other on a mental level. In game terms this is handled by a few new mutations and some guidelines to handle these types of societial structure. In addtion, four NPC races are included (one also gives a PC option) that range from peaceful agrarians to cyborgs that seek to integrate everyone they come into contact.

The PDF is book-marked and includes layers so that the backgrounds can be turned off for ease of printing.

158611.name: Heroic Maps Small Tiles: Dungeon Core Set
158611.description:
From publisher blurb:

Dungeon Core Set contains 25 generic geomorphic tiles that will allow you to build a simple yet extensive dungeon.
Dungeon Core Set is a printable geomorphic tile set, compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl game.

Dungeon Core Set contains 25 unique 6x6 geomorphic tiles that can be arranged in thousands of combinations.

Also included is a set of 300dpi full size jpgs, for poster printing or VTT. Please note that the pages are set as A4. You'll need to adjust if printing on US paper.

158612.name: Everglow Champions
158612.description:
From publisher blurb:

A collection of Ponyfinder characters ready for use. All level 1 and chomping at the bit to be put into the frey.

158613.name: Die, Romeo, Die!
158613.description:
West Side Story meets Grand Theft Auto in Die, Romeo, Die!

Imagine you are playing GTA 6, a game that doesn't exist – yet. In between crimes, you see a story about forbidden Shakespearean love among rival street gangs unfolding in the cut scenes...and it's going to end badly! Hoping to detour the inevitable tragedy, you attempt to influence the transitions and guide the story to a less-than-catastrophic, more "Happily Ever After" conclusion.

158614.name: Bob's Brain
158614.description:
Our hero Bob has a problem. He needs to do something — but what? And how does he deal with the fallout of what he does? In Bob's Brain, a party game and social experiment of psychological upheaval, the players are different "voices" in Bob's head, each seeking to influence his actions in problem-solving. One player presents problems that Bob faces; the other players come up with solutions, then derive the problems that might come from their answers.

Due to set backs this game has not been published but if you are a psychotherapist and want to try it out at work I will sell one off copies at cost to get people using it in counseling. It has been a very good tool for me in my thirty years in social work.

158615.name: Fairy Tale Assassin League: City of Broken Dreams
158615.description:
Fairy Tale Assassin League is a storytelling card game in which the Wizard of Oz crew have gone to Hollywood in search of stardom. The catch is that only one of them will make it. Who will it be? The over-acting scarecrow, Dorothy, or the Flying Monkeys?

Multiple FTAL decks are available, and they can be combined for a larger scale game.

Due to difficulties this game won't come out in 2014. Hopefully we can get it out next year!

158616.description: Escape: Traps is the third boxed expansion for Escape: The Curse of the Temple, and like the previous Illusions and Quests expansions, Traps will contain two modules that can be used individually or in combination with any other expansions for the game.
158616.name: Escape: The Curse of the Temple – Traps
boardgameexpansion: Escape: The Curse of the Temple
Escape: The Curse of the Temple – Big Box
Escape: The Curse of the Temple – Big Box: Kickstarter Edition

158617.name: Firefly: Out to the Black – Browncoat Bonus Pack
158617.description:
Game description from the publisher:

Aimin' to do a little more misbehavin' in Firefly: Out to the Black? You're in luck – now you can expand your game with the Firefly: Out to the Black – Browncoat Bonus Pack, which introduces a new mission called a Big Job, and adds more than 15 new cards, makin' for excitin' new gameplay and thrillin' heroics! Shiny!

158618.name: Firefly: Out to the Black – Serenity Bonus Pack
158618.description:
Game description from the publisher:

Think you've mastered the 'verse in Firefly: Out to the Black? Well, not so fast my friend as you can now expand your game with the Firefly: Out to the Black – Serenity Bonus Pack, which adds more than 15 new cards that are focused on the characters you have in play. Will Jayne get greedy and hump the mission, or will River be able to read the hidden cards before they get played? You never know what may happen when you're out in the black!

158619.name: The Afflictionist: A Dungeon World Playbook
158619.description:
From publisher blurb:

There are more dangers in Dungeon World than just in the dungeons alone. In the deep forgotten recesses of the cities; disease runs rampant killing men, women, and children alike. Treatment is all but impossible to come by, as those who try to assist only spread the infection further. That’s where you come in.

You, who are basically immune to disease, poison, and venom; your touch can draw illness from the stricken. You are a boon to the ever expanding communities throughout Dungeon World.

You dare not keep all those toxins inside you though. You also have to ability to let loose those plagues upon others, which makes you an asset to the adventuring parties as well.

So go forth you merchant of pox, spread your name as you spread your pestilence.

158620.name: Tre Kronor Infernum: Fire to Ashes
158620.description:
Tre Kronor Infernum - the Board Game© is a game about a fight between a castle and a fire. You are in charge of a group of servants and responsible for extinguishing the fire that has broken out in the royal castle of Tre Kronor. Your servants must set up a human chain together with the other players' servants and pass water buckets to each other. You must also save the possessions from the burning inferno but not at the cost of letting a room burn down. How should you prioritize? What if the other players WANT the room to burn down so that they can steal possessions for themselves? What if you want to do it yourself? Beware, if the entire castle burns down, all players lose!
Game mechanism include:

1. Changing game board: The basic game board is fixed but the spread of the fire is unique for every game.
2. Interdependence: The players cooperate to extinguish the fire.
3. Asymmetric scoring: The score from a room depends on whether it is rescued or burns down.
4. Hidden agendas: The players decide whether they want a room to be rescued or burn down.
5. Guessing game: By guessing the other's agenda, a player can benefit from their actions or disrupt their strategies.

Tre Kronor Infernum is the fifth game in the Nova Suecia series.

158621.description:
Game description from the publisher:

World War II: Battle for Moscow, 1941 offers a new challenge to confront Soviet and German commanders on the Eastern Front: the deadly Russian winter! Fully compatible with all World War II Art of Tactic games and miniatures, this standalone starter set introduces new winter weather rules, boards, and terrain pieces, and features all-new sculpts for German and Soviet soldiers in winter uniforms and the new T-35 Soviet tank!
158621.name: World War II: Battle for Moscow, 1941

158622.name: Jito
158622.description:
From the designer notes: "JITO is a multi-game format rather than a single game. It can be simply competative, like most games. It can be a sophisticated game that features competitive cooperation, or it can be a completely cooperative game. You are invited to invent your own game using the board, but we would suggest that you start with the usual competitive game to learn how to balance cards most effectively and how to guess future peg locations with the greatest success. (Remember that the longest dimension of a card is from one corner to another.)"

In Game I., 2 players (or 2 teams of 2 players) compete to be the first the cross the board from one site to the opposite side with a continuous bridge of cards balanced on pegs.

Play progresses by each player throwing 2,d6 dice then a player may place a peg in the area on the board that matches the number thrown. After placing a peg, you may attempt to balance one or more cards on your peg(s). You may not overlap or touch an opponent's card bridge or share pegs. You must place a card within 20 seconds or lose your turn. The game ends when one of the players spans the board from one side to the opposite side (side to side, up and down, or diagonally). A completed bridge is worth 3 points. The usual match is to 6, 9, or 12 points.

Game II variant: This variant is a cooperative/competitive game for 3 players. Three players attempt to cross the board, but at any time 2 players may voluntarily decide to merge and build a bridge together. If they succeed in reaching the opposite site first, each player receives 1.5 points. The usual match is to 4, 5, or 7 points.

Game III variant: This version is fully cooperative and is for 2, 3, or, 4 players. All players work together to build a successful bridge. Individual scoring is assessed by counting the same-colored number of cards belonging to an individual player. You may also desire to set a time limit as the goal for building a bridge together.

158624.description:
Machi Koro: Gaming Mega Store is a one-card expansion for Machi Koro, with five copies of the card being included.

Die Roll: 10, Cost $7
Effect: "You may choose to activate another of your non (landmark, big establishment icon) establishments in place of this one, on your turn only. If you do, return this card to the market."
158624.name: Machi Koro: Gaming Mega Store
boardgamepodcastepisode: CnC Plays Ep 22 - Machi Koro
Episode 22 - Machi Koro

158625.name: Źródło
158625.description:
The Source is an adventure board game published by City Hall of Sieradz. Players are divided into two groups. First group takes roles of investigators trying to locate legendary Source which is hidden somewhere in Sieradz. Second group takes the role of ghosts trying to prevent finding of The Source. Game introduces players to history of Sieradz and has many educational values.

---

Przygodowa gra przygotowana przez Urząd Miasta Sieradza w celu promocji miasta. Część graczy wciela się w poszukiwaczy, którzy starają się znaleźć legendarne Źródło Inspiracji, które znajduje się w Sieradzu. Pozostali uczestnicy są duchami historycznych postaci związanych z miastem i starają się nie dopuścić poszukiwaczy do Źródła. W tym celu wysyłają na nich lunatyków i mgłę. Gra zawiera wiele elementów edukacyjnych związanych z historią Sieradza.

158626.name: Killzone: Mercenary
videogamehonor: 2013 Global Game Awards Best Handheld Game of the Year Nominee
158626.description:
Killzone: Mercenary is a first-person shooter video game for the PlayStation Vita, released in September 2013.

Killzone: Mercenary takes place on the planets Vekta and Helghan, locked in an interstellar war. The game is set in between Killzone 2 and Killzone 3 and revisits many of the key events of Killzone, Killzone: Liberation, and Killzone 2 from the perspective of Arran Danner, a mercenary hired to execute operations for the ISA. He is supplied by mysterious weapons dealer Blackjack, and is aided at times by his boss Anders Benoit.

Killzone: Mercenary has received generally positive reviews with an aggregate Metacritic score of 78/100. It managed to highly exceed the first two PS Vita first person shooters, Call of Duty: Black Ops Declassified and Resistance: Burning Skies, which both received fairly negative reviews. The game sold 11,053 copies in Japan within the first week of release. IGN called it "the best portable shooter ever made". TheSixthAxis stated "there’s no other experience like this on a device as small as this". It received the 1st Place 2013 PlayStation Vita Game of the Year Award.

Source: Wikipedia, "Killzone: Mercenary", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

158627.name: Pirate Corvette
158627.description:
From the Intro:

This map product is a full-colour, 48 x 20 inch, floor plan of a pirate corvette. The map comes in two forms; a well-kept pirate ship (which is a larger reproduction of the suggested starting ship for Adventurers shown in the Pirates & Dragons Core Rulebook), and a rotting hulk, which can be used as a zombie pirate ship, ghost ship, etc.

158628.name: Etnias Élficas
158628.description:
From Introduction:

Esse é o quinto e-book do blog Homeless Dragons e nele traremos diversas linhagens de elfos descritas em diversos cenários adaptadas para o Old Dragon para que você possa usá-los em sua mesa de jogo.

Como sempre, sugestões e críticas são sempre bem vindas, desde que tenham o ntuito de melhorar o material apresentado, precisamos do feedback de vocês para podermos melhorar cada vez mais.


Translation courtesy of Google:

This is the fifth eBook Blog Homeless Dragons and it will bring several strains of elves described in several scenarios adapted to the Old Dragon so you can use them in your game table.

As always, suggestions and comments are always welcome, provided they have the ntuito to improve the material presented, we need feedback from you so we can improve even more.

158629.name: Fuhr e Stahlia: Dois Reinos em Eterno Conflito
158629.description:
From Introduction:

Entre as Montanhas Sanguinárias e o Rio dos Deuses, ao Norte da floresta, fica o reino de Fuhr. Fuhr tem uma grande história de guerras e batalhas. Batalhas contra o Reinado, contra os invasores vindos da Grande Savana e do Deserto da Perdição e quem mais que se colocasse à sua frente.


Translation courtesy of Google:

Among the Sanguinaires Mountains and River of Gods, north of the forest, is the kingdom of Fuhr. Fuhr has a great history of wars and battles. Battles against Reinado, against the invaders from the Gran Sabana and the Desert of Doom and who else is put before him.

158630.name: Hengeyoukais
158630.description:
From Introduction:

Esse e-book já estava amadurecendo a um bom tempo em nossas cabeças, mas nunca soubemos como organizar essas ideías de fato, foi quando “achamos” o e-book praticamente pronto no Forum da Jambo, para nossa sorte tinha muita coisa já estruturada lá, graças a um colaborador muito especial, Weaver, e com sua autorização poderemos usar os Hengeyoukais também no Old Dragon.

Muitos podem virar a cara para esse suplemento por ser não ser legitimamente Old School, mas mesmo assim iremos publicá-lo, achamos que o RPG independente da sua vertente deve aproveitar o que há de bom em todos os cenários e sistemas e trazê-los para nossa mesa de jogo.

Algumas coisas foram alteradas para deixar o e-book mais próximo do estilo de jogo Old Dragon, mas ainda assim temos novas regras para o sistema, espero que gostem.

Como todo bom suplemento, isso é apenas uma sugestão de jogo, adaptem-na ao estilo da sua mesa e divirtam-se.


Translation courtesy of Google:

This eBook was already maturing at a good time in our heads, but never knew how to organize these ideas in fact, was when "we" the eBook almost ready at the Forum Jambo, luckily had a lot of stuff in there already structured thanks to a very special collaborator, Weaver, and with your permission we may use Hengeyoukais also in Old Dragon.

Many may turn to face for this supplement because it is not legitimately be old school, but even then we publish it, we think that regardless of your shed RPG should enjoy what is good in all scenarios and systems and bring them to our game table.

Some things were changed to make the eBook nearest Old Dragon style of play, but still we have new rules for the system, hope you enjoy.

Like any good supplement, it is just a hint of game, adapt it to the style of your table and enjoy.

158631.name: Le Perfum
158631.description:
From Introduction:

Talvez “Le Perfum” não seja um nome muito conhecido em toda Arton, mas é, sem dúvida, uma unanimidade entre os nobres, principalmente entre os que alimentam o desejo de conquistar alguma dama.

Com seus perfumes, loções e águas de banho, a Le Perfum é atualmente uma das lojas mais tradicionais do Reinado, quase uma instituição. Mais que simples frascos com líquidos cheirosos, os produtos Le Perfum são símbolo de status, com seus preços altos, seus potes decorados e suas fragrâncias estonteantes. Se fosse só isso, “Le Perfum” talvez fosse apenas uma loja para esnobes. Mas para quem conhece Ban Deoverd, é uma oportunidade de ouro. Ban construiu Le Perfum há aproximadamente dez anos. Longe da outrora jovialidade que lhe era característica, cansado da vida de estudioso, e sem ter ficado rico o bastante nem com sua vida de aventureiro nem com as vendas de poções, teve a idéia que mudou sua vida: levar perfume e magia à vida dos nobres famintos por status.


Translation courtesy of Google:

Maybe "Le Perfum" is not a household name across Arton, but it is undoubtedly a consensus among the nobles, particularly among those who harbor ambitions to conquer any lady.

With its perfumes, lotions and bathing waters, Le Perfum is currently one of the most traditional stores Reinado, almost an institution. More than just smelling bottles with liquids, Le Perfum products are a status symbol, with its high prices, their decorated pots and stunning fragrances. If it was only that, "Le Perfum" maybe it was just a store for snobs. But who knows Ban Deoverd, is a golden opportunity. Ban Le Perfum built about ten years ago. Away from what was once her characteristic playfulness, tired of life as a scholar, and without having been rich enough nor with his life of adventure and with sales of potions, had the idea that changed his life: to bring scent and magic into the lives of nobles hungry for status.

158632.name: A Lenda do Príncipe Demônio
158632.description:
From Introduction:

Esta aventura, desenvolvida inicialmente para Advanced Dungeons & Dragons, por Greg Rick e Brad Schell, foi mais tarde traduzida por Sérgio de Paula Queiroz e publicada na revista Dragon, trazida ao Brasil pela editora Abril Jovem. Nosso objetivo ao trazer esta adaptação é somente o de resgatar aventuras clássicas de fantasia e apresentá-las aos novos jogadores e/ou proporcionar aos antigos um gosto de nostalgia. Este é um trabalho totalmente sem fins lucrativos.


Translation courtesy of Google:

This adventure, originally developed for the Advanced Dungeons & Dragons, by Greg Rick and Brad Schell, was later translated by Sérgio de Paula Queiroz and published in Dragon magazine, brought to Brazil by Editora Young April. We aim to bring this adaptation is only to rescue classic fantasy adventures and introduce them to new players and / or provide a taste of nostalgia old.

158633.name: Livreto de Magias Arcanas
158633.description:
From Introduction:

A magia arcana é aquela que o mago lança valendo-se de seu estudo, pesquisa e da aptidão mágica caracterizada pelo seu nível na classe. O mago, diferentemente do clérigo, não recebe seu poder de uma entidade, ao contrário, se especializa e estuda fórmulas e receitas arcanas para, através delas, realizar seus efeitos arcanos pré-memorizados e pré-determinados em intricadas fórmulas mágicas escritas em seu livro de magia, chamado de grimório.


Translation courtesy of Google:

Arcane magic is that the mage casts drawing on his study, research and magical aptitude characterized by its level in the class. The magician, unlike the cleric does not get its power from one entity instead specializing and studying arcane formulas and recipes for through them accomplish their pre-stored arcane effects and predetermined in intricate magical formulas written in your book magic, called the library.

158634.name: Livro de Regras Basicas
158634.description:
From Introduction:

A ideia por trás do Old Dragon surgiu do descontentamento com relação às novidades nos nossos RPGs favoritos. O Old Dragon nasceu porque acreditamos que o RPG pode ser mais imaginativo, mais caótico e não tão equilibrado e pasteurizado quanto a nova onda dos jogos atuais que tanto recebe críticas por aí.

Movido pelo método old school de se jogar, o Old Dragon não busca emular os jogos dos anos 70 e 80, em que o mestre tinha maior poder sobre o jogo e onde não havia uma buscaobsessiva pelo equilíbrio e pela padronização. O Old Dragon busca ser um jogo com temática old school, baseado na desnecessidade de regras para controlar toda e qualquer situação, deixando para que o mestre adjudique com base no seu bom-senso.

No Old Dragon não é a ficha que determina as possibilidades de ação de um personagem, mas sim o jogador que o controla. No Old Dragon não é o leque de opções que restringe as ações do personagem, mas sim a imaginação do jogador.

Enfim, este é um esboço do Old Dragon. Esta proposta inicial servirá de base para que a versão completa que virá em breve. Esta proposta inicial serve para ser criticada, xingada, modificada e alterada conforme a necessidade, onde buscaremos o que considerarmos ideal para que o Old Dragon fique o melhor
possível.


Translation courtesy of Google:

The idea behind the Old Dragon 's discontent arose regarding news on our favorite RPGs . The Old Dragon was born because we believe that the RPG can be more imaginative, more chaotic and not so balanced and pasteurized as the new wave of the current games that both receives criticism there.

Moved by the old school method of playing the Old Dragon does not seek to emulate the games of the 70s and 80s , in which the master had greater power over the game and where there was no buscaobsessiva for balance and standardization . The Old Dragon seeks to be a game -themed old school , based on no need for rules to control any situation , leaving the master adjudicate based on your common sense .

In Old Dragon is not the record that determines the possibilities of action of a character , but the player who controls it. In Old Dragon is not the range of options that restricts the actions of the character, but the player's imagination .

Anyway, this is a sketch of the Old Dragon . This initial proposal as the basis for the full version coming soon . This initial proposal is to be criticized , called names , modified and amended as necessary , seek where what we consider ideal for the Old Dragon be the best possible.

158635.name: Fore!
158635.description:
User Summary

Seven golfers can play on four different courses in this early golfing simulation. Choose your difficulty level (Handicap), Select your club and aim your shot in 360 degree increments. Four different length courses made up of randomly selected holes can be played in low resolution.

158636.description:
Pushee Pieces is a 2 player microgame that is deceptively simple and deep. Set on several different checkered boards with monster themes, each player gets 15 turns to get their pieces on the squares with the highest points. At the end of 15 turns when all the pieces are used up, a winner is declared.

But there's one trick: the pieces push each other.

When a piece is placed, depending on its position, it will push any pieces in adjacent squares one space away from it. This can cause chain reactions which can radically alter the board with each turn. An entire game takes about 10 minutes and it incredibly fun.
158636.name: Pushee Pieces

158637.description: The expansion pack Cat Hiding Plus adds four different types of cards to either Cat Hiding or Cat Hiding DX, with these cards being played from the hand to peek at two cat cards in play or swap one goal for another.
158637.name: Cat Hiding Plus

158638.description:
The basis of Cat Hiding DX — with the "DX" standing for "deluxe edition" — is Cat Hiding, a memory game in which each player starts with a hand of three cards; each card has three cat pictures, such as the face, tail or paws. A 4x4 grid of matching cards of each cat picture are placed face down. The active player plays a card from her hand, then flips three cards in the grid face up. If these cards match the card from her hand, she scores it. She may then attempt to match a second card from her hand, etc.

Cat Hiding DX includes components for five variant editions of the game, including a new type of target card and cat dice.
158638.name: Cat Hiding DX

158639.name: Big Fun Battle
158639.description: In Big Fun Battle, players use their earth, water, wind, wood, and fire cards to attack one another and guess one another's line-up.

158640.name: The Three Pillars: A Paranormal Card Game
boardgameexpansion: The Three Pillars: Allies & Adversaries Expansion Set
The Three Pillars: Batteries Not Required Expansion Set
The Three Pillars: Extreme Hauntings Expansion Set
The Three Pillars: GameHoleCon Promo Card
158640.description:
The Three Pillars is a fast-paced, witty game of checks and balances that celebrates the paranormal community while gently satirizing the drama that is often encountered within it. Assemble your team, visit haunted locations and submit evidence to close the cases - but be warned - not only must you deal with Murphy's Law, but with other paranormal teams investigating the same places as you - and chances are, they won't be helpful. Never before has Paranormal Division been so fun!

Players compete to score the most points they can by playing Evidence cards at three separate locations. Each turn a player picks up a card and either plays or discards a card - each time they are faced with a choice: they can play a card to help themselves or to hinder their opponent. Event cards are triggered at various points in the game to introduce an element of randomness and can either be good or bad - you never know!

Meant as a stand-alone game, it can be played straight out of the box. Expansions are being developed to keep gameplay fresh, while maintaining the core rules.

158641.name: Midsummer Wood
158641.description:
A roleplaying game for 1 mortal player & 3–4 fairie players.

From the introduction:
It's midsummer and in the darkest, weirdest wood the fairies meet in mask to feast and fête. Of mortals, the canniest and most wary can dare to join them. The rewards are wealth and poetry, pleasure, love and magic. The risks are sanity and soul.

You are just such, a mortal man or mortal woman cunning, lovely and bold. Can you move uncaught among these, the perilous and subtle, shapechangers, elementals, embodiments of the oldest fears? Can you rob them of their treasures and escape, or will they discover you, bind you, and make you theirs?

158642.name: What's The Question?
158642.description:
What's The Question? is a party game involving discussion and debate. Two players represent two sides. The rest of the player are voters. All players write down a subject of a topic. In this example, we'll say "Fictional Characters". After everyone has written something on a piece of paper (Or in our prototype version, our curved white boards) and placed it in the middle of the table, they are shuffled and the two players choose one. That choice will be the sides they are representing. In this example, we will say "Superman" and "Darth Vader". On the other side of the card is the question. In this example, the question may be "Who would win in a fight?" Now is the time that it is revealed and the two players begin the debate. Players may do anything in their power to get the other players to vote for their side. Points are earned by winning a debate and voting for a winner.

What's The Question? is a great game for any crowd. Because the players create the content, the game can be used in a family atmosphere, or amongst your friends over a long night of drinks. This game takes the idea of sitting around with your friends while you debate about things that don't matter, then adding a random element to it fueled by the players.

Planned expansions include adult themed pack, intelligence pack, and much more!

158643.description:
Objective: Be the first reaching space 45
- moving by turns -
Simple 'Roll&Move' game; each space you land on has printed instructions you have to follow immidiately like: step forward or backwards, pay or get...; space 45 must be reached precisely;
note:
Game should had been published early 1900 (indicated by drawings and numbering system); publisher was well known by term/products: 'Neuruppiner Bilderbogen' (pictorial broadsheet)
158643.name: Neuestes Post- u. Reisespiel

158645.name: Operation Olive: Gothic Line '44
158645.description:
ASLer and historian … and Repubblic of San Marino national, Gian Carlo Ceccoli has crafted a tasty bit of MTO history for you in GL44-OpOlive.
The set combines a set of 16 historical scenarios set on geo boards from your standard collection-plus 3 historical maps provided in the set using the new lay-flat, hard boards. You also get a set of historical notes to bring the battle home to your gaming table.
Gian Carlo poured his heart and soul into this effort-and researched it as only someone with on-site capabilities could. We kept the look classic and G.C. really shows a touch for straightforward, playable scenarios. You will NOT be buried in piece density.
You WILL be buried in esoteric history!
Includes a sheet of overlays, 3 maps, special rules, and a full scenario set.

158646.name: The Big Book of Little Spaces: Haunts
158646.description:
From publisher blurb:

With eight different Little Spaces products out in the wild, it was time for a compilation product. The Big Book of Little Spaces: Haunts combines six different products (Ghostly Effects, Scary Basements, Abandoned Places, Gruesome Graves, Creepy Copses, and Horrid Hallways) and rolls them into a single book with an expanded list of descriptors for each of the five senses, expanded examples, and methods for mixing and matching different tables to create even more unique ideas.

Just like all the Little Spaces, the Big Book offers some suggestions on what it is your PCs may have in store for them. It starts by determining which sense you use for the description, then deciding what element you’re describing and gaining some sensory detail about that element.

For example, if you’re describing an abandoned place with an oddly smooth smell and the remains of some unfortunate soul (Smell/Remains/Smooth) you might get…

“In the corner of the abandoned room lies a corpse of smooth, white bones and a few tattered clothes. All that is left is the smell of dust and abandoned dreams of treasure and glory…”

If that’s not enough, you can determine whether the place they’re coming to is occupied or not (detailed in Appendix 2). Perhaps a group of pygmies is waiting to ambush the party as soon as they find the entrance or a family of wild animals has made its home in the brush.

Thousands of possible combinations will inspire an insane number of adventurous encounters and hidden secrets. Your players may wonder if you’re secretly an explorer with knowledge of all the places lost to time and experience…

158647.name: Aasimar
158647.description:
From publisher blurb:


Sword of the Righteous!

Aasimar might carry a few drops of heavenly blood—but they are warriors and summoners to be rightly feared! For they shall lay down the word of the Law, sinners, and strike down upon the wicked with furious anger!

With celestial power and the unique insight of the divine, the aasimar deliver both a touch of divine grace, and unique insight into how and why great evils might best be destroyed!

Advanced Races: Aasimar gives you everything you need to play an aasimar adventurer from the celestial traditions. This 20-page sourcebook by designer Adam Roy includes:

6 new aasimar racial traits and 4 Mythic traits including Celestial Awareness, Fiery Light of Heaven, Mythic Mark, and Splendor of the Divine
9 new Mythic feats and 4 regular feats, including Adamant Spirit, Greater Smite, Purity of Heaven, and Supreme Celestial Resistance
3 new archetypes: Celestial Rhymer, Celestial Summoner, and Purifier
14 new spells and 2 new subdomains, Angel and Radiance
3 new Mythic magic items and 4 Transcendant Artifacts
An overview of the Aasimar in the Midgard Campaign Setting
And much more!




The celestial chorus calls you to right the wrongs of the world—smite down demons, speak forth the words of the Law, and bring down your righteous hammer on the unholy!

158648.name: The Chronicler
158648.description:
From publisher blurb:

Brave explorers and scavengers of lost or forgotten knowledge, chroniclers are quintessential adventurers, exploring the world for esoteric truths, magical and mundane relics and artifacts, and new and mysterious vistas, be they wonderful or terrible. For some, this journey is purely about the wealth, for others the glory of discovery, and still more are stirred by the irresistible drive to uncover the bones of the ages and legends of forgotten epochs in an effort to chronicle the deeds of yesterday, today, and tomorrow.

Prestige Class: Chronicler
Build Classes: Bard

158649.name: Possession
158649.description:
From publisher blurb:

This series of ebooks explore the varied ways that a single spell or concept can be adapted into a range of new spells.

This fourth ebook in the series explores possession spells, specifically magic jar. It offers a wide range of new spells, from cantrips to 9th level. Within its pages are to be found the following:

20 Spells built around the possession concept, including new magic jar variants and spells to modify, enhance, and protect against possession spells.
A dozen new feats to add options to those who use possession magic.
A new version of the magic jar spell that is more suitable to its level.




Spell Themes: Possession is a spell sourcebook compatible with the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game and suitable for GMs and players of any level.

158650.name: Dreams of the Red Wizards: Dead in Thay
rpg: Dungeons & Dragons (5th Edition, Playtest & Promotional Docs)
158650.description:
From publisher blurb:

Szass Tam, the lich lord of Thay, and his Red Wizards threaten to dominate all of the Sword Coast. The Bloodgate, an elemental node of power, must be destroyed in order to stop him. This adventure is part two of the Dreams of the Red Wizards Sundering storyline, directly tied to Scourge of the Sword Coast, and loosely connected to the events in Ghosts of Dragonspear Castle.

Dead in Thay is a tribute to Tomb of Horrors, The Ruins of Undermountain, and other killer dungeons. The monsters, traps, and hazards in the adventure create a deadly challenge.

158651.name: Suplemento para o cenário Lodoss, a Ilha Amaldiçoada 1: Tesouros & Dragões
158651.description:
From Introduction:

Esse é o primeiro suplemento para o cenário Lodoss, a Ilha Amaldiçoada e abordará os principais itens mágicos de Lodoss e também as mais temidas criaturas de Forceria, os Dragões Anciões.


Translation courtesy of Google:

This is the first supplement to the Lodoss scenario, the Cursed Island, and address the major magic items of Lodoss and also the most feared creatures of Forceria, the Elder Dragons.

158652.name: Suplemento para o cenário Lodoss, a Ilha Amaldiçoada 2: Títulos & Especializações
158652.description:
From Introduction:

Esse é o segundo suplemento para o cenário Lodoss, a Ilha Amaldiçoada e abordará um assunto que interessa, e muito, os jogadores: As Especializações.

Nesse suplemento teremos regras para as famosas Especializações do sistema Old Dragon , mas elas seguirão um rumo um pouco diferente, servirão também como Títulos e terão alguns pré-requisitos além do alinhamento e da classe.


Translation courtesy of Google:

This is the second supplement to the Lodoss scenario, the Cursed Island and will address a subject that interests you, and much, players: Specializations.

In this supplement we have rules for the Old Majors famous Dragon system, but they will follow a slightly different course, will also serve as securities and will have some prerequisites beyond the alignment and class.

158653.name: Lodoss, a Ilha Amaldiçoada
158653.description:
From Introduction:

Esse e-book foi baseado no anime Record of Lodoss War, escrito pelo japonês Ryo Mizuno e lançado tempos mais tarde pelo estúdio Madhouse. No Brasil o anime foi lançado pela Livraria Devit e os mangás pela Editora Conrad.

Nesse livro vamos seguir as regras do sistema brasileiro Old Dragon. Apesar de ser uma adaptação, tentarei não deturpar o sistema e muito menos o cenário, lembrando
que esse é meu primeiro e-book e depois de anos, meu primeiro contato com RPG. Fui motivado a fazê-lo depois de ler algumas iniciativas old school.

Para seguir essa tendência old school nada melhor do que uma adaptação do anime mais old school de todos, Record of Lodoss War.


Translation courtesy of Google:

This eBook was based on the anime Record of Lodoss War, written by Ryo Mizuno Japanese and released later times by the studio Madhouse. In Brazil the anime was released by Library Devit and manga by Conrad Editora.

In this book we follow the rules of the Brazilian system Old Dragon. Despite being an adaptation, try not to misrepresent the system, much less the stage, reminding
this is my first eBook and then years, my first contact with RPG. I was motivated to do so after reading some old school initiatives.

To follow this trend old school nothing better than an adaptation of the more old school anime of all, Record of Lodoss War.

158654.name: O Asilo Nabla
158654.description:
From Introduction:

Localizado a alguns quilômetros ao norte de Valkaria, um lugar tranqüilo e pacífico é destinado ao estudo e tratamento de pessoas que sofrem de distúrbios mentais e psicológicos.

Fundado e dirigido por Caesar Nabla, um clérigo de Marah estudioso da loucura e outros problemas relacionados, e financiado pela Academia Arcana, o Asilo Nabla abriga atualmente cerca de 160 internos, contanto com a ajuda de 30 voluntários, clérigos de diversas ordens e magos pesquisadores.

O Asilo é uma grande área de 200.000 m2 (400m x 500m), cercada por altos muros de pedra lisa. Um grande portão de ferro ornamenta a entrada, que leva a um pequeno caminho de pedra, ao final do qual fica um conjunto de três prédios.


Translation courtesy of Google:

Located a few miles north of Valkaria, a quiet and peaceful place is for the study and treatment of persons suffering from mental and psychological disorders.

Founded and directed by Caesar Nabla, a cleric of Marah scholar of madness and other related problems, and funded by the Academy Arcana, Asylum Nabla currently houses about 160 inmates, provided with the help of 30 volunteers, several orders of clerics and mages researchers .

The Asylum is a large area of ​​200,000 m2 (400m x 500m), surrounded by high walls of flat stone. A large iron gate decorates the entrance, which leads to a small stone path, the end of which is a set of three buildings.

158655.name: Massina Subsector
158655.description:
From publisher blurb:

The ignored and forgotten regions of the Zhodani Consulate of Massina Subsector are still populated with people that need your help. With insufficient resources to maintain an enlightened society, problems that law enforcement officials are unequipped to handle arise everywhere. With danger lurking behind every asteroid, how will you change lives? Will you start a cult or stop one from spreading? Will you put a stop to a corporation that treats its employees like slaves, or will you join those rulers? Only you can decide.
Foreven Worlds: Massina Subsector is an 13 page supplement for Traveller. Inside you will find:

intricate details for 7 worlds of this subsector and the people that make their way in this ignored region of Zhodani space,
an overview of all the other planets in the subsector,
a detailed, full-color map of the subsector,
and plot hooks for you to create your own campaign.




What destiny lies in your hands?

158656.name: Fessor Subsector
158656.description:
From publisher blurb:

Beyond the Third Imperium's borders and in the shadow of the Zhodani Consulate lies the subsector of Fessor. Brutal warlords and savage space pirates take what they can while agents of major powers ply their trade in secret. With danger lurking behind every asteroid, how will you change lives? Will you seek your fortune or topple a dictator bent on domination? Will you wage a war or stop one? Will you bring peace at the point of a gun or by spreading ideas? Only you can decide.
Foreven Worlds: Fessor Subsector is an 11 page supplement for Traveller. Inside you will find:

details of the 28 worlds and the people that make their way in this lawless region of space,
a detailed color map of the subsector, showing political boundaries, locations of bases and much more,
and plenty of plot hooks for you to create your own campaign.




What destiny lies in your hands?

158657.name: O Dojo do Deus Dragão
158657.description:
From Introduction:

O Dojo do Deus Dragão é um pequeno dojo (academia de artes marciais) que ensina artes marciais tamuranianas em Gorendill. Fundada por um sobrevivente (hoje com uns setenta anos de idade) da chacina de Tormenta em Tamu-ra, o dojo ensina algumas das técnicas de combate e defesa pessoal mais eficientes do antigo Império de Jade, sejam elas de combate armado ou desarmado, para aqueles que puderem pagar suas mensalidades.


Translation courtesy of Google:

The Dojo Dragon God is a small dojo (martial arts academy) who teaches martial arts in tamuranianas Gorendill. Founded by a survivor (now with about seventy years old) Slaughter Storm in Tamu-ra, some of the dojo teaches fighting techniques and more efficient personal defense of the former Empire of Jade, be they armed or unarmed combat to those who can pay their tuition.

rpgitemversion: Le Livre de Cuisine PDF version
158658.name: W20 Cookbook
158658.description:
From the Back of the Book:

The Tribes of Garou

Every werewolf tribe has its traditions, legends, and customs. From the tales of lordly Silver Fangs to the debased Black Spiral Dancers, and from the isolated Siberakh to the long-dead White Howlers, those legends live on. Part of that culture comes across through each tribe’s attitude towards food.

One Meal at a Time

This book is a first for the World of Darkness, providing both extra background details on each tribe of Garou and a tasty recipe that’s representative of the tribe. Many of them come with variations for feeding those Garou and Kinfolk who hold to vegetarian or vegan diets, or are gluten-intolerant. Storytellers may want to use the W20 Cookbook as an in-character prop, or as inspiration to cook something for their players before the game begins.

The W20 Cookbook contains:

Twenty recipes for tasty dishes, one for each tribe of the Garou.
Recipes range from entrees to desserts to snacks to eat on the run.
Examinations of how each tribe approaches food, and how even the Red Talons can enjoy a cooked meal.

158659.description:
Objective: Be the first making a complete circuit around the board
- acting/moving by turns -
Each player moves forward according die roll; draw a card and follow instructions, often finding correct answer. Question & answer cards focus on enviromental issues.
158659.name: Frankfurter Umwelt-Spiel

158660.name: Strange Sights of the Doomed World Carcosa
158660.description:
from the introduction:
This product is for use with Supplement V: CARCOSA by Geoffrey McKinney… It will be useful to have a copy of Supplement V: CARCOSA handy, as reference is made to several of the encounters from the original “Map One Hex Descriptions”.

Most of these encounters are suitable for a variety of different games, including classic fantasy, swords & sorcery,post-apocalyptic & more, and I encourage anyone using this supplement to cherry-pick ideas as you see fit. Many encounters are also generalized in nature, with details left up to the imagination and improvisation of the DM.

I hope you enjoy!

user comment:
The hex descriptions published in this free supplement to the original Supplement V: CARCOSA were integrated into the revised and expanded edition of Carcosa published by Lamentations of the Flame Princess.

158661.name: Wissens-Quiz für Kinder: Tiere, Technik, Natur
158661.description:
This learning/quiz game follows the usual scheme for quiz and trivia games: One stops his move on a colored spot and has to answer a question from that category. If the answer is correct, the player receives a knowledge chip in that color. The first player who has 8 chips in different colors, wins the game.

This is a 3-in-1 edition with more than 3,000 questions (as opposed to the 1,000 in the separate editions) about

Tiere (Animals): Pets/Local Animals - Exotic Animals - Reptiles - Animals in and around Water - Birds - Insects - Prehestoric Animals - Animals in Books and Films

Technik (Technology): Cars - Motorbikes - Aeroplanes - Ships - Railways - Space Flight - Computer & Internet - Technology in General

Natur (Nature): Trees - Shrubs - Mushrooms - Flowers - Garden and Agriculture - Heaven & Earth - Environment and nature protection - Nature in general

158662.name: O Orco Feliz
158662.description:
From Introduction:

O objetivo deste humilde suplemento é começar a criar uma série de materiais para o Mestre de Jogo para nosso sistema Old Dragon. O que eu desejo aqui, além de homenagear os velhos AD&D e D&D, primeira edição é dar um revival em nossa Old School em termos de jogos de RPG.

Com fui criado a base de muito “hack´n slash” com aventuras que desenvolvia com meus antigos jogadores, estou literalmente abrindo o baú e trazendo material que serviu para motivos de diversão em muitos “viradões de RPG”. O Orco Feliz é uma rede de tabernas no mundo de Lyzarbi (do qual tencionamos em transformar em material para o sistema), onde diversas aventuras são iniciadas e ainda serve para fazer com que os novatos possam se integra neste estilo de jogo. É um material do qual o mestre pode expandir e que serve como base para outros.

Aventura para Personagens de Nível 1-4


Translation courtesy of Google:

The purpose of this supplement is humble start creating a series of materials for the Game Master to our Old Dragon system. What I want here, and honor the old AD & D and D & D, first edition is to provide a revival in our old school in terms of RPG games.

I was raised with a very basic "hack'n slash" with adventures that developed with my former players, I'm literally opening the chest and bringing material that served to reasons of fun in many "viradões RPG". Orco Happy is a network of taverns in the world Lyzarbi (which we intend to turn into material for the system), where several adventures are initiated and still serves to make newcomers can integrates this style of play. It is a material which can expand the master and which serves as a basis for others.

Adventure for characters level 1-4

158663.name: Os Peregrinos Ocultos
158663.description:
From Introduction:

“O sol baixava no horizonte e, conforme Tenebra assumia o controle, as pessoas olhavam abismadas para nós. Elas nos viam assumir uma forma fantasmagórica, e lentamente, desaparecer da visão de todos. Já estamos acostumados com essa situação.”

Há muito tempo uma grande caravana percorria Arton, eles era conhecidos como Ak-Lanmas, ou, na linguagem do deserto, Areia de Ouro. Os Ak-Lanmas, pertenciam aos SarAllan, era como se fossem uma divisão desses. O modo de vida dos Ak-Lanmas era basicamente esse: andar, chegar em uma cidade, vender mercadorias, comprar mercadorias e ir embora, rumo a outra cidade, onde tudo se repetiria novamente. Mesmo com essa vida “rotineira”, os Al-Lamnas eram um povo feliz. As festas eram comuns entre eles, principalmente no verão, onde comemoravam, quase que todos os dias a força e a supremacia de Azgher. Em suas festas a comida era abundante, belas mulheres dançavam para todos, os homens falavam de negócios e contavam piadas, enfim, uma vida pacata e feliz. Todos os governantes dos AkLanmas vinham da família Sallam, que era respeitada e obedecida por todos. Esta, diziam os Ak-Lanmas, teria sido a família mãe de todos os povos do deserto, e por isso, devia ser respeitada. Na verdade, até entre os Sar-Allan existiam(e existem), muitos Sallam, mas eles não tem este respeito diferenciado por eles.


Translation courtesy of Google:

" The sun descended on the horizon and , as Tenebra took control , people looked mystified for us . They saw us take on a ghostly form , and slowly disappear from the sight of all . We are used to this situation. "

Long ago a large caravan ran Arton , they were known as Ak - Lanmas , or , in the language of the desert , Sand Gold . The Ak - Lanmas belonged to SarAllan , it was as if they were such a division . The way of life of Ak - Lanmas was basically this : walk , arrive in a town , sell goods , buy goods and walk away , towards another city , where everything is repeated again. Even with this " routine " life, Al - Lamnas were a happy people . The parties were common among them , especially in the summer , where they celebrated, almost every day the strength and supremacy of Azgher . In their festivals food was plentiful , beautiful women dancing for all men spoke of business and told jokes , finally , a quiet and happy life . All rulers of AkLanmas Sallam came from family that was respected and obeyed by all . This , said the Ak - Lanmas , the family would have been the mother of all desert peoples , and therefore should be respected . In fact , even among the Sar - Allan existed ( and exist) , many Sallam , but they do not have this distinctive respect for them .

158664.name: República Schwarzwald
158664.description:
From Introduction:

Esse e-book foi baseado no MMORPG Ragnarok Online, criado pelo sul coreano Lee Myung-Jin e distribuido pela empresa Gravity. Ragnarok Online foi o primeiro MMORPG totalmente traduzido para o português e é distribuido no Brasil pela Level Up Games.

Nesse e-book iremos descrever apenas a Schwarzwald, Arunafelz não será descrita nesse momento.

Lembrando que essa adaptação abrangerá o período que jogamos no BrO, que foi de 2000 a 2006/2007.

Nesse livro vamos seguir as regras do sistema brasileiro Old Dragon, e mesmo Ragnarok não sendo um cenário tipicamente old school, decidimos arriscar e esperamos que essa adaptação atenda as expectativas de vocês.


Translation courtesy of Google:

" The sun descended on the horizon and , as Tenebra took control , people looked mystified for us . They saw us take on a ghostly form , and slowly disappear from the sight of all . We are used to this situation. "

Long ago a large caravan ran Arton , they were known as Ak - Lanmas , or , in the language of the desert , Sand Gold . The Ak - Lanmas belonged to SarAllan , it was as if they were such a division . The way of life of Ak - Lanmas was basically this : walk , arrive in a town , sell goods , buy goods and walk away , towards another city , where everything is repeated again. Even with this " routine " life, Al - Lamnas were a happy people . The parties were common among them , especially in the summer , where they celebrated, almost every day the strength and supremacy of Azgher . In their festivals food was plentiful , beautiful women dancing for all men spoke of business and told jokes , finally , a quiet and happy life . All rulers of AkLanmas Sallam came from family that was respected and obeyed by all . This , said the Ak - Lanmas , the family would have been the mother of all desert peoples , and therefore should be respected . In fact , even among the Sar - Allan existed ( and exist) , many Sallam , but they do not have this distinctive respect for them .

158665.name: The Legend of Dead Man's Hand
158665.description:
The Legend of Dead Man´s Hand is a campaing source book for Dead Man´s Hand. It includes rules for running multi-player campaigns, 11 new scenes (Scenarios), rules for rogues (Named characters) and has rules for four new gangs: Banditos, Renegade Indians, 7th Cavakry and Pinkertons.

Trough the campaing system the gangs are getting into schemes, gets reputation and experience and suffers injuries and death.

The book also comes with four sets of playing cards. One set for each of the new gangs.

158666.name: O Resgate da Princesa Élfica
158666.description:
From Introduction:

Esta aventura é uma versão um pouco mais aprimorada da mesma, narrada por mim no OdDay 2011. Desenvolvida para ser jogada em uma única sessão, perfeita para encontros e convenções de RPG, seu desenvolvimento teve por orientação maior a tentativa de recriar uma trama de fantasia medieval clássica. Nela, os jogadores terão chance de interpretar valorosos heróis, combater monstros, explorar masmorras e mudar o destino de uma região inteira! Como sempre, você, narrador, tem toda a liberdade para mudar o que quiser, para que a aventura se encaixe melhor ao estilo de jogo do seu grupo ou seu estilo próprio de mestrar. Fique a vontade para incluir, ou retirar, encontros de combate, personagens, armadilhas ou o mais que desejar. O Resgate da Princesa Élfica é um inicio para sua jornada de aventuras, cabe a vocês a tarefa de desenvolver o restante da história. Então, leia a aventura, junte os amigos, ponha os dados na mesa e comece a jornada!!


Translation courtesy of Google:

This adventure is a slightly improved version of the same , narrated by me in OdDay 2011. Designed to be played in a single session , perfect for meetings and conventions RPG , its development has further guidance to attempt to recreate a web of fantasy medieval Classic . In it , players will have the chance to play valorous heroes , fight monsters , explore dungeons and change the fate of an entire region ! As always , you , the narrator , is at liberty to change what you want, so that the adventure best fits the style of play of your group or your own style of GMing . Feel free to add , or withdraw combat encounters , characters , traps or as you wish. Saving the Elven Princess is a start to your journey of adventures , you are charged with the task of developing the rest of the story . Then , read the adventure , gather friends , put the data in the table and start the journey !

158667.name: The Covetous Poet's Adventure Creator and Solo GM Guidebook
158667.description:
From the Introduction:

The Covetous Poet's Adventure Creator and Solo GM Guidebook is a resource meant to help roleplaying enthusiasts create their own brand new adventures, as well as to allow them to play their favorite group roleplaying games all by themselves. It doesn't provide any particular roleplaying system, nor rules for how to play. Instead it works in conjunction with roleplaying systems you already own: you'll be able to make up tales for your PCs to play through, and possibly even play those tales solo.

The Adventure Creator

You're still the author when you use the Adventure Creator to make up a roleplaying adventure, but you will have a very powerful friend helping you. The Adventure Creator guides you through the structure used by professionally written adventure supplements, and the Story Charts, found in the middle of this book, can provide you countless combinations of ideas to inspire you and beef up the ideas you already have. Once you've read through the chapter covering the Creator, you'll know all you need to know to go ahead and give adventure writing a try.

The chapter that comes after, Variations on the Act Structure will cover several different ways you can build your adventures beyond what you first learn with the Adventure Creator. One of the great things about every system presented in this book is that they are all modifiable and adaptable to whatever you want them to be. No one writes adventures the exact same way, or plays their games the exact same way, so you're always encouraged to make the book adapt to what you want it to be.

The Solo GM Guidebook

Using the Adventure Creator as its primary tool, the Solo GM Guidebook is a system that assists solo roleplayers in playing their games all by themselves. It will show you how to create your adventures as you play them, scene by scene, improvising everything as you go, playing both as the PCs and as the GM. Thanks to the framework provided by the Adventure Creator even improvised adventures can maintain a consistent and coherent narrative that, with a little practice, can be very much like playing with a prewritten supplement.

Besides the story of your roleplaying adventure, the Guidebook also has suggestions, tips, and charts to help you make PC personalities, NPCs, improvise conversations, create clues, devise mysteries, and more. Once you have read the chapter you can immediately begin adopting the tools you like to help facilitate your gameplay, and enjoy your favorite RPGs as a solo GM!

158668.name: Wettrennen mit dem Verderb
158668.description:
Objective: be the first reaching space 80/learn more about the lifecycle of food
- moving by turns -
Move forward according die roll; ending on a marked space follow instructions printed on the back of the map

158670.name: Mecha Mettle
158670.description:
Theme
In the distant future, the galaxy is at war. Battle rages across the stars as campaigns are won and lost in the vastness of space. Your role in this conflict puts you as the captain in command of a customized ship, whose purpose is to engage your enemies in thrilling and strategic space combat. Successful command requires you to know how to use your ship to its fullest. Attacking with your modules, evading incoming assaults, and maintaining the ship’s integrity is all done with the end goal of taking advantage of weaknesses in your enemy’s defense. Be strong, be brave, and most importantly, take risks.

Overview
Mecha Mettle is a 2 player card and dice game where the players are engaged in space combat as captains of their own custom ships. Players build their ship by playing module cards and choosing components that give special ship abilities. Battle takes place by firing with modules and rolling dice to resolve combat. Positioning and taking advantage of better numbers is the key to winning. The game ends once one player destroys 5 of their opponents ports.

158671.name: The Carcosan Grimoire
158671.description:
\'\'subtitle\'\'
A CARCOSA COMMUNITY PROJECT

\'\'from the foreword by Geoffrey McKinney\'\'
Herein lies a wealth of imaginative and horrific material for use in D&D campaigns, especially those campaigns inspired by Supplement V: CARCOSA. Everything herein is, of course, entirely optional. That said, nothing held between the covers of this tome would I hesitate to use in a D&D campaign. What weird ceremonies occur in that squat stone village beneath twisted and bloated trees? What incomprehensible customs do the men practice, and in what sort of alien architecture do they lurk? All such questions can be easily answered with the aid of the treasures in your hands.

Also included are bizarre pigments, new monsters (suitably terrifying), new mutations, new artifacts, new eldritch locations, new character types (the apothecarial witch and the implacable Brothers of the Skull), various random tables (including encounter tables), and more. None of the contents of \'\'\'\'\'The Carcosan Grimoire\'\'\'\'\' adds complexity to the rules. Instead, everything is calculated to make the referee’s thankless job easier, and to provide greater variety for the referees and their players.

Lastly, the kind originator of this volume, Cameron DuBeers, has seen fit to include some of my comments regarding Carcosa, gleaned from various places on the internet going back over three years. Anyone reading this section will discover that my conceptions of Carcosa have mutated over the years, and they continue to mutate. I hope that this invaluable booklet will help all our D&D campaigns mutate in extraordinary and unsuspected directions.

Enjoy!

\'\'user comment:\'\'
Two versions of this fan-created supplement are available, one for reading, with single digest-size pages, and another for printing, formatted for duplex printing and stapling to create a booklet. The content is the same in both versions.

158672.description:
On the mythical archaeological zone of Palenque, located in the Chiapas State, Mexico, there is a pyramid known as "The Temple of inscriptions", built by the Mayans to shelter king Pakal's tomb. The tomb was discovered on June 1952 and it represents one of the most important archaeological discoveries of history.

In this game the players collaborate with the pyramid construction and each player tries to accumulate the biggest treasure in order to win the game. The treasure is formed by the treasure tiles that are obtained during the construction stages, and the jewel cards that can be accumulated till the end of the game.

The rounds are composed by 3 phases. Each phase concludes when all the players have performed their play for that phase.

PHASE 1: CARDS DRAW
Each player draws 2 cards from the top of the pile. If a player draws a card of a level that has been already constructed, this card is sent to the discard pile and the player can draw a new card.

PHASE 2: CARDS SWAP
Each player can swap one of their cards with one card at the swap zone; players must leave the cards face up. Cards of already constructed levels cannot be used.

PHASE 3: CONSTRUCTION
Each player decides if he summons to the construction of the pyramid's level, if he chooses not to, then the player must mention that he passes the opportunity to the next player.
If no player summons to the construction, then is the end of the phase 3 and the round concludes.
When a player summons to the construction he must pay 1 point (with his treasure tiles) and place the tile over the gameboard, this gives him the right to be the first to set cards for construction.

CONSTRUCTION RULES
-Pyramid levels must be constructed in ascending order.
-Each pyramid level is completed with 5 construction cards of the corresponding level.
-Jewel cards can be used as wild cards. Two jewel cards will be considered as one construction card, so they must be used in pairs for this purpose.
-A player can set a máximum of 3 construction cards.

If a player summons to the construction but the 5 necessary consturction cards (required for the corresponding level) are not completed, then players take back the set cards and the player that has summoned to the construction loses the point that he has paid. In this case is also the end of phase 3 and the round concludes.

In case that the construction of the corresponding level is completed:
-The corresponding pyramid tile is placed over the gameboard.
-The players that have collaborated in the construction take the corresponding points from the treasure tiles at the gameboard (see the scoring rules).
-Cards used for the construction are sent to the discard pile.
-If any player has cards left of the consturcted level, then he must place them on the discard pile (players have no right to recover these cards).
-If there are cards of the constructed level at the swap zone, they are placed on the discard pile as well and replaced with cards from the pile.

END OF GAME
When the construction of level 9 of the pyramid (temple) is completed, the game ends.
The jewel cards that players have accumulated have a value of 1 point each and are added to the value of thier treasure tiles. The winner is the player with the most treasure points.
158672.name: La tumba del rey Pakal

158677.description: Star Trek: Attack Wing Faction Bases are a great way to highlight which faction(s) players have included in their fleets! Each Faction Base pack includes four (4) Faction color bases and 10 Faction color pegs for use with Star Trek: Attack Wing.
158677.name: Star Trek: Attack Wing – Faction Base/Pegs Set

158679.name: Operation: Shadowpoint
158679.description:
From the introduction:

Operation Shadowpoint is an adventure for the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion: Beginner Game. It is designed to follow the events of Takeover at Whisper Base, the adventure included in the Beginner Game.

After the events of the Beginner Game adventure, the Player Characters (PCs) have seized the Imperial installation on the planet of Onderon, once called “Whisper Base,” for the Rebel Alliance. They might have killed or captured its commanding officer, Lieutenant Sarev, and dealt similarly with the remaining staff of the base. They now have access to a secret, off-the-books facility plugged into the Imperial communications network—a powerful resource for the struggling Rebellion. However, while the Imperial bureaucracy at large does not have any knowledge of the base, the PCs must still contend with its master and originator, Moff Dardano.

The nefarious Imperial Moff is willing to do anything to recover his lost asset without allowing hisrivals in the Empire to learn of its existence, much less of its capture. It is only a matter of time before the Moff takes action to reclaim the base and bring it back under his iron-fisted control. Can the PCs establish a strong enough position to defend what they have taken and turn it into a long-term gain for the Rebellion? Now is the time to test their commitment,resourcefulness, skills, and above all, mettle.

158680.name: République - Episode 1: Exordium
158680.description:
You receive a desperate phone call from Hope, a young woman trapped within a shadowy totalitarian state. Using a stolen phone, she calls and begs you to hack into the nation’s surveillance system, assume control, and help her escape from the clutches of the omnipresent Overseer.

Source: The Publisher Website.

158681.description:
Promocards for Limes.

Included in the Spielbox Magazine 02/2014.

6 Startcards (Set A). The Startcards provide a different starting situation for each player.

When setting up the game, shuffle the Startcards and deal one card to each player. This will be the first card of their display. Then the game continues as usual.
158681.name: Limes: Startcards Set A

boardgamehonor: 2014 Spiel der Spiele Hit für Kinder Recommended
158682.description: Together with the Magic Raven Schnabelgrün, the children collect leftover grain seeds from the bales of straw for the sparrows. Who remembers best, in which bales the most seeds are? And who lets Scarecrow Otto chase herself/himself to the right bale in the tactically higher version - and uses her/his Magic Stars in the best way?
158682.name: Die verrückte Vogelscheuche

158683.name: Space Station
158683.description:
From publisher blurb:

This Product is a 5 level, Black and White Blueprint of a Space Station. It is 40 inches by 40 inches at its widest point.

The Product comes with the Hex, Square and No Overlay versions and the Virtual Tabletop Maps.

“This space station is said to have a multitude of advanced systems. B.F.C., Alpha Core. I.S.C. These are mere buzzwords, but I want to know more. Infiltrate the vessel, learn its secrets, and bring them to me.”

The Space Station is a hand-drawn, black and white, blueprint style map. The product includes five internal levels and an outer platform level of a large spaceship or space station. The five internal levels are the bridge, security, medbay, officer level, and crew level. Each individual area in the spacecraft is labeled and includes hand-drawn objects signifying all of the furnishings in the area.

The Spacecraft is designed for adaptability. You can exclude levels that you do not need or have no place on the spaceship or space station. You can also make the spaceship or space station larger by using levels twice or more. The officer level has enough rooms for 4 officers and the crew level has enough rooms for 48 crewmen. By using all the levels this means you have enough space for a crew of 52. But you can add additional crew and officer levels to increase the population of the spaceship or space station to the desired level. For example, a second officer and crew level added allows for a crew of 104 people.

The Spacecraft is intended for use in science fiction games.

Adventure hook for use with this product.

To Steal the Star: The new space station is a technical marvel. A rival space company wants to know everything about the station, so they can copy its functions. They hire a group of infiltrators to enter the space station as tourists, sneak into critical areas, and steal as much information about the space station as possible. The infiltrators could be the PCs or they could be new officers working on the space station that need to stop the infiltrators instead.

But why stop at just the blueprints and schematics? When the infiltrators discover that the I.S.C. can be used to propel the space station, they decide to hijack the whole space station instead either for themselves or take to their employer! It is up to the officers on the ship to stop them.

158684.description: The players try to manoeuvre the fishes into the four coloured caves in the play cloth. This needs a lot of dexterity, coordination and verbal communication. Beware! The fishes have to avoid the black caves. If they swim in, the shark will eat them. Who has collected the most fish after four rounds? You – or the shark?
158684.name: Balamari

158685.name: Sheep's Clothing
158685.description:
From publisher blurb:

In the Sheep's Clothing Series Pitch, Jérôme Larré (Qin, Tenga) takes you inside a tranquil bedroom community for cops—as a massive Internal Affairs bust threatens dozens of its key citizens.

158686.name: Gallows
158686.description:
From publisher blurb:

An assassin without a name, Gallows carries nothing but pain and death for any heroes he crosses. Armed with a special shotgun and the ability to summon a noose of mystical energy, its only a matter of time before he heads to your city.

158687.name: Chassis
158687.description:
From publisher blurb:

Right from the pages of the best-selling WatchGuard Sourcebook comes the WG Solo series!

Meet CHASSIS!! The spoiled, brilliant jerk of a son who stole his dad's experiments is ready to take his light-based powersuit to new heights of villainy in your next advetnures!

158688.name: Find Nix
158688.description: Raupe and Co. abound on the colorful cards. On what object do they sit? What shape and color is the background? Only those who keep track here, gain points.

158689.description:
Cheese, sausage, bread and old stuff - everything is scattered in the attic. Each mouse tries to remove as much as possible to a safe place as stock. However, the cat is just silently lying in ambush; suddenly it appears between the mice, the mice quickly speed into their holes before they can start their next search again.

Who has collected the most points at the end wins this perky game as the cheekiest mouse.
158689.name: Die frechen Mäuse

158690.name: Golden OGLies #1
158690.description:
From publisher blurb:

Now in Sword and Wizardry format: Public Domain Supers. Take your heroes through the cavernous Superhuman Bases that contain all sorts of superhuman trickery. Use these Supers to oppose or aid your own heroes quest for superhumanity. Nearly 20 heroes and villians are here for your perusal.

158691.name: As Ruínas de Nagora
158691.description:
From Introduction:

As Ruínas de Nagora é uma aventura pronta para o jogo de RPG nacional Old Dragon. Escrita há cerca de cinco anos, a mesma tinha o propósito inicial de integrar um fanzine chamado Os Caçadores de Aventuras. Em seu formato original, esta aventura era dirigida à jogadores de nível 5, sendo compatível com, Dungeons & Dragons 3.5, 3D&T e Primeira Aventura. Em meados de 2010, refiz esta com o intuito de ajudar narradores iniciantes no sistema, simples e prático, de Old Dragon. Agora, a aventura, da maneira em que foi estruturada, deve ser jogada por cerca de seis personagens em segundo nível. Assim como em sua versão original, ela tem o propósito de ser direta e objetiva, dando ao mestre toda a liberdade para modificar o que achar necessário para adaptá-la a sua história. Adentrem nos perigos de uma autentica Dungeon estilo Old Scholl.


Translation courtesy of Google:

The Ruins of Nagora is ready for the National Old RPG game Dragon adventure. Writing about five years ago, it had the initial purpose of integrating a fanzine called The Hunters Adventures. In its original form, this adventure was directed at the players level 5 and is compatible with Dungeons & Dragons 3.5, 3D & T and First Adventure. In mid-2010, redid this in order to help beginners narrators in the system, simple and practical, Old Dragon. Now, the adventure, the way it was structured, to be played for about six characters in the second level. As in the original version, she is meant to be direct and objective, giving the master free to modify what's necessary to adapt it to your story. Adentrem the dangers of authentic style Old Dungeon Scholl.

158692.name: Rune Midgard
158692.description:
From Introduction:

Esse e-book foi baseado no MMORPG Ragnarok Online, criado pelo sul coreano Lee Myung-Jin e distribuido pela empresa Gravity. Ragnarok Online foi o primeiro MMORPG totalmente traduzido para o português e é distribuido no Brasil pela Level Up Games.

Nesse e-book iremos descrever apenas o continente de Rune Midgard, embora no jogo já hajam novas regiões, como Schwarzwald e Arunafelz, elas não serão descritas
nesse momento.

Lembrando que essa adaptação abrangerá o período que jogamos no BrO, que foi de 2000 a 2006/2007.


Translation courtesy of Google:

This eBook was based on the MMORPG Ragnarok Online, created by South Korean Lee Myung-Jin and distributed by the company Gravity. Ragnarok Online was the first MMORPG fully translated into Portuguese and is distributed in Brazil by Level Up Games.

In this eBook we will describe only the continent of Rune Midgard, although the game there are already new regions, as Schwarzwald and Arunafelz, they will not be described
at this time.

Remembering that this adaptation will cover the period we played in BrO, which was from 2000 to 2006/2007.

158693.name: Santuário da Lua  Minguante
158693.description:
From Introduction:

Quando Lenórien caiu, no final da Infinita Guerra, poucos sobreviventes conseguiram fugir. Com o passar dos anos, os elfos e elfas sobreviventes foram vivendo do modo que podiam, escondendo-se, vagando, morando nas cidades do Reinado. Porém, entre esses sobreviventes, estava um grupo de três amigas, que em Lenórien agiam como clérigas de Luna, deusa da Lua e da Vida, hoje conhecida como Lena no Reinado. Essas três amigas, Silmarien, Finduillas e Morwen, vagaram pelas terras de Arton Norte, sem rumo, até que encontraram as cordilheiras de Lannestull.
